items.question: What is the function of SECOM Smart Security Web Portal and Mobile App?
items.answer: The SECOM Smart Security Web Portal and Mobile App allow you to manage your security system anytime, anywhere. Through the app, you can arm or disarm your alarm, view live camera footage, and receive instant notifications. For more advanced features, like device settings, user access, and detailed activity logs, you can use the web portal. Both platforms are designed to give you full control over your security while keeping your data private and secure.

items.question: Will I receive alerts if the alarm goes off when I'm not home?
items.answer: Yes. If your alarm is triggered while you're away, you'll receive instant notifications through the SECOM Smart Security App. This ensures you're always informed of any unusual activity, no matter where you are. SECOM's 24/7 monitoring team will also respond immediately to verify the situation and take necessary action.

items.question: Will my privacy be protected with the cloud video storage?
items.answer: Yes. Your privacy is our top priority. All video footage is securely encrypted and stored in the cloud. Only you can access your recordings. SECOM can only view your video footage during verified emergencies and only to ensure your safety. Outside of that, your data remains completely private.

items.question: Can I view footage from multiple properties in one app?
items.answer: Yes. The SECOM Smart Security App allows you to monitor multiple properties under one account. You can easily switch between locations to view live footage, check alerts, and manage each site's security system, all from a single app.
